message.body: Hey! Hope you're living it up in the hotel! Wanna hang Saturday? Lunch and a movie??

Hey! I jumped on that hotel bed so hard! I'll have to let you know about Saturday. This week is really crazy with shooting and I need to prep for a workshop at Penn. Not sure when I'm gonna have time to do it yet!
Cool! Just let me know when you know! I'm outta town the weekend after and gone again during the week for a few days, but let's check in and try and find
a time that works! :)
Where you heading next weekend? I'll be in Richmond that weekend!
NY! Visit with Lorraine!
Why you going to Richmond??
Oh yeah!!! That will be fun! I'm being recognized as "distinguished alumni" have to do a panel and dinner
Woah!! You are so distinguished!! :)
I keep saying extinguished.
Did you guys ever hear back from that hawk man??
Nope:( hunter is so sad.
I told him we will find something just as good
He took the listing down off the internet.
Oh man! What a bummer!
Totally. Something even better!
I know. I'm bummed too but not as much as hunter.
Stupid he didn't even contact you guys...to let you know either way.
I know! Hunter thinks maybe he realized the land is worth more than he listed and he's gonna try again and didn't want to tell us.
I think he's just probably a weirdo
Yeah he's probably a weirdo for sure.. bummer though.
I have to say though, I am selfishly glad you aren't moving away!
Yeah I think it would have been too fast for me! Anyway I'll Keep in touch about Saturday!
Yes KIT please! Have fun at the hotel!
I'm heading back to philly now to teach my class at 4. I'm so exhausted!
Yikes! How you gonna make it through?? Just put on a movie.
